title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry Potter discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Hunger Games
description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in the Hunger Games.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Scout Finch grows up in the racially charged Deep South, learning life lessons from her father Atticus.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates love, manners, and marriage in 19th-century England.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: Jay Gatsby throws lavish parties in hopes of reuniting with his lost love, Daisy Buchanan.
